title: Im trying to download the game and it keeps crashing during a certain time
body: My Issue is its crashing during the download it repeatly does that and i tried to resinstall i allowed it into my firewall i also tried that ? mark to see if any corrupted fails nothing will work please help thankyou

replies.body: I'd like to help out but need more information here.  When you say crashing what do you mean?  Are you getting error messages and what does it say?  Anything can help!
